desc.name: Develop landing pages that support localization and multiple languages
Develop in house HR cadidate management system
I am responsible for creating the frontend of the web app including all the state management logic.I handle the chat feature which communicates with a gRPC backend
The chat features use S3, as it image storage. I created the task management feature which communicates with a graphql backend. I created the user authentication which uses Oidc 2.0 flow
The UI is build using react native components, this makes the project more versatile as it can be port to mobile if needed
Gatsbyjs, React-native-web, Mobx, Apollo-client, emotion.js, Typescript
Developed a centralize monitoring system that can control, send and receive information from 10 connected machines through WLAN network
My task also includes creating machine sequence and features according to customer specifications
